name: Mobile Phone Repairing Tool Kit
description: A mobile repair electronic tool kits consists of most of the small tools need for most electronic repairing jobs.

name: Precision Screwdriver
description: Precision screwdriver is used to unscrew and remove and tighten screws while assembling and dissembling a mobile phone

name: Screwdriver Kit
description: A screwdriver kit has several screwdrivers of different shapes and sizes to dissemble and assemble a mobile phone.

name: Microscope or Magnifier
description: These used to see a magnified view of PCB or electronic components. These are available in different zoom options like 3X, 5X etc.

name: Soldering Iron
description: A soldering iron is used to solder small components like capacitor, resistor, diode, transistor, regulator, display etc.

name: Soldering Station
description: A soldering station has 2 units â€“ a station and an iron. It has option to control temperature depending on the heat.

name: Multimeter
description: A multimeter can be analog or digital. In mobile phone repairing, mostly a digital multimeter is used to find faults.

name: BGA Kit
description: A BGA Repair Kit is used to Reball and repair ball-type ICs. BGA stands for Ball Grid Array.

name: Hot Air Blower
description: A hot air blower is also called SMD (Surface Mount Device) rework station and SMD repair system.

name: Wrist Strap
description: It is worn in the wrist of the person who is repairing a mobile phone. It is used for ESD Prevention and helps to discharge.

name: Battery Booster
description: A battery booster is used to boost the power of battery of a mobile phone.

name: Magnifying Lamp
description: It is used to see the magnified view of the PCB of a mobile phone. Most magnifying lamps also have light.
